text:
Run apache server
press the stop button to stop it
it doesnt stop, it goes for a while and then one gets a blue screen crash 
some CPU page fault.

I havent seen a blue screen before on my system, this is the first time since I 
installed apache 2.0.44

Please HELP!
creator: khanf@attbi.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7932 ***
creator: jwoolley@apache.org
khanf@attbi.com
text: i am using zone alarm also

creator: towerofpower@operamail.com
text:
What are the codes on the blue screen?  You have not given us any useful 
information.  Compiled or MSI?  What modules loaded?  What other 
applications/services are running?  Standard config file?  Standard make(if 
compiled)?

I would also like to add, that I have compiled and used the msi win32 install 
versions.  On win2000 SP3, I have not had any blue screens, except what I have 
said in bug#17055(only relevant to SSL).

Clearly, if the win32 version of Apache 2.0.44 had blues screens of death and 
was broken, everyone would be posting about it.

Format your system, re-install win2k and IE with all relevant patches.  Then re-
install Apache2.0.44.  That is your solution.
